department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada (DFATD)
description: This bid solicitation is being issued for the requirement of Professional Services to conduct a summative evaluation of the Improving Bean Productivity and Markets in Africa (IBPMA) project for the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada under the ProServices Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply which specifically covers requirements for below the CKFTA threshold.

full_summary:
**Proservices - Evaluation Services**

**Reference:** cb-722-77926808

**Amendment:** 8

**Solicitation Number:** 23-229573

**Publication Date:** 2023-10-12

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-31T14:00:00 (expired)

**Amendment Date:** 2023-10-31

**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-01

**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-05-31

**Proservices Category:**

* Project Monitoring and Evaluation
* Demining Risk Analysis or Assessment or Evaluation Service

**Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development Canada (DFATD)
* Address: 125 Sussex Dr., Ottawa, ON K1A 0G2, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Christian Meghaizel, Tel.: (613) 791-8548, Email: [Christian.Meghaizel@international.gc.ca](mailto:Christian.Meghaizel@international.gc.ca)
* Address: 200 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC, Canada

**Tender Overview:**

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development Canada (DFATD) is inviting qualified bidders to provide evaluation services for the Improving Bean Productivity and Markets in Africa (IBPMA) project. The evaluation will assess the project's outcomes, identify key factors contributing to or hindering its achievement and sustainability, and inform future similar programming with the Pan-Africa Bean Research Alliance (PABRA).

**Criteria for Eligibility:**

* Bidders must be registered under the Proservices Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply.
* Bidders must have a minimum of one (1) resource qualified under the Proservices Stream for Business Consulting / Change Management, Category 9.12 - Evaluation Services Consultant, Level Senior (3).
* Bidders must have a minimum of two (2) resources qualified under the Proservices Stream for Business Consulting / Change Management, Category 9.14 – Subject Matter Expert, Level Senior (3).

**Documents:**

* Tender Notice and Instructions: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21839/23
